page.title: 04SCHOOL DINNERS,COTEHILL
page.content: Our dinner ladies are called Mrs Reed and Mrs Fullerton.Mrs Reed is very kind.She watches us at dinner time, play time and buys sweets for us and takes us on to the field for play time.Mrs Fullerton is very kind too because she doesn't get mad with the infants when they dawdle about not knowing what to get for dinner. We have a few choices of what to have for dinner. Once a month the dinner man brings choc-ices but usually it is yogurt,apples ,cake, custard and sometimes cream cakes. Sometimes Ribena or drinking chocolate or milk shake. On Mondays when you come into school you go into the kitchen to pay for your dinner.You pay Â£2.50 for a weeks dinner.We have dinner in a room that we call the middle room.
